title: Pi-DE component unit test gaps (SpawnModal, initStorage, patchLit)
summary: Created 3 comprehensive test files with 25 new tests: SpawnModal.test.tsx (11 tests), initStorage.test.ts (10 tests), patchLit.test.ts (4 tests). All 59 pi-de tests pass with 100% coverage on initStorage.ts and >80% on SpawnModal.tsx. Commit: 5a0d0c5

tests: npm test in pi-de shows 59 passing tests
